#include<stdio.h>
 
int main()
{
    int t=0;
    long long int n,k,m;
 
    scanf("%d",&t);
 
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&n,&k,&m);
        if(k == 1)
            printf("\n%lld",n);
        else
        {
            while((n%k==0) && m)
            {
                n /= k;
                m--;
            }
            if(m % 2 != 0)
                n *= k;
            printf("\n%lld",n);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
